newsitem.title: USA: Computer Assoc encouraged by product line.
newsitem.headline: Computer Assoc encouraged by product line.

text.p: Computer Associates International Inc said on Tuesday it was encouraged by the strength of its client/server product line, particularly Unicenter TNG, and that it continues to improve product offerings faster than competitors.

"Our fourth-quarter performance was on track," said Sanjay Kumar, president and chief operating officer. "Client/server revenue for the fiscal year totaled over $1.36 billion, 48 percent greater than the prior year," he added.

The remarks accompanied CA's fourth quarter earnings results, in which it reported net income of $336 million, compared with last year's $265.1 million. Income per share increased 29 percent to $0.90, up from $0.70 a year ago, the company said.
Computer Associates International develops and supports business software.
